notes.body: Hello Chetan Shah,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653763109900980224-94974, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 01st December 2025. We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us. notes.body_html:
Hello Chetan Shah,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #653763109900980224-94974, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 01st December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Suman,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  As per the update received on your concern, this order has been delivered to you. We hope you received your order safely.  We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you by your order. Be rest assured, as we have jotted down the details of your experience. We have shared stern feedback with the team and we will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.  For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Suman,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

As per the update received on your concern, this order has been delivered to you. We hope you received your order safely.

We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you by your order. Be rest assured, as we have jotted down the details of your experience. We have shared stern feedback with the team and we will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body_html: Kindly Arrange Bengali langauge Callback - 9635997598

notes.body: The customer raised concerns regarding added medicines, incorrect guidance, and the Plus membership.     The executive informed the customer that a particular medicine was unavailable. However, it STATOR F STRIP OF 15 TABLETS had already been handed over to the courier partner, so modification was not possible. This led the customer to believe he was misinformed. The customer was told that only one quantity would be added, but three additional quantities were included: DIAMICRON XR MEX 60/500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS, which were not required for the patient. I explained our written policies and guided the customer on how to use the application.     The customer was also confused about the Plus membership benefits. Since he is comfortable only in Bengali, there may have been a language-related miscommunication -I informed the customer that, after the delivery, if he wishes, he may cancel the Plus membership. As this is his first order with PharmEasy, we can offer a refund to the original payment source as an exception.     The major concern is the misguidance regarding the quantity.Requesting you to please check and take the necessary action. Feedback has also been recorded for the out-of-stock issue.
notes.body_html:
The customer raised concerns regarding added medicines, incorrect guidance, and the Plus membership.

The executive informed the customer that a particular medicine was unavailable. However, it STATOR F STRIP OF 15 TABLETS had already been handed over to the courier partner, so modification was not possible. This led the customer to believe he was misinformed. The customer was told that only one quantity would be added, but three additional quantities were included: DIAMICRON XR MEX 60/500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS, which were not required for the patient. I explained our written policies and guided the customer on how to use the application.

The customer was also confused about the Plus membership benefits. Since he is comfortable only in Bengali, there may have been a language-related miscommunication -I informed the customer that, after the delivery, if he wishes, he may cancel the Plus membership. As this is his first order with PharmEasy, we can offer a refund to the original payment source as an exception.

The major concern is the misguidance regarding the quantity. Requesting you to please check and take the necessary action. Feedback has also been recorded for the out-of-stock issue.

We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you and hope to serve you better ahead.     In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Lalit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We have received an update from our Logistics team that your order has been delivered to you. We hope you have received the same today. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you and hope to serve you better ahead.

In the future, please contact our Level 1 customer service team via a call to 8071324888 or send an email to care@pharmeasy.in. If your query remains unresolved for 7 days after you have reached out to our Level 1 Customer support, you can escalate the matter to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

 You're invited!  Secure AI-Powered Productivity with Microsoft 365 E3 
 

 

 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Join us virtually on December 3rd Dear Customer, You wont want to miss this unique opportunity to hear first-hand from our Microsoft experts, thought leaders and peers of latest technology trends, insights, and Cloud solutions. In todays rapidly evolving digital landscape, organizations are under increasing pressure to boost productivity while maintaining robust security and compliance. With the rise of generative AI and Microsoft 365 Copilot, the opportunity to transform how we work has never been greaterbut neither have the risks. Join us for an in-depth session exploring how Microsoft 365 E3 empowers organizations to unlock AI-driven productivity while upholding the highest standards of data protection, governance, and Zero Trust principles.

 Digital event

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22251375  
      Subject: Subject: Strict Complaint Regarding Return of Wrong Medicine (Complaint No. 22240354)  
      Description:  To, Customer Support Team 
 Pharmeasy 
   
 Dear Sir/Madam, 
   
 I am writing this letter to strongly express my dissatisfaction regarding the handling of my return request for the wrong medicine delivered to me. 
   
 I had ordered three medicines on 30th, out of which one medicine received was wrong. I raised a complaint immediately, and the return request was initiated under Complaint Number 22240354. 
   
 However, even after 5 days, no proper action has been taken from your side. According to your team, the medicine is being considered changed, which is completely incorrect and unacceptable. 
   
 On 1st, when your pickup person visited to collect the return, he refused to take the medicine stating that the barcode is missing. This reason is completely invalid because the product was delivered to me in the same condition. If the barcode was missing, it is solely your packing or delivery teams mistake, not mine. 
   
 I have been calling repeatedly, but still no resolution, no refund, and no proper response has been provided. 
   
 This kind of service is highly unprofessional. I request you to immediately process my return and refund without further delay. If this issue is not resolved at the earliest, I will be forced to escalate this matter to higher authorities and consumer court. 
   
 I expect a prompt and serious response regarding this matter. 
   
 Sincerely, 
 Dr. Mujib Khan 
 7892556617

notes.body:
Dear Customer Support Team,

This is in reference to my earlier email regarding Complaint No. 22240354.
Your team had assured me that appropriate action would be taken within two
days, yet no response or resolution has been provided till now.

It has already been several days since I raised this complaint about the
incorrect medicine delivered and your delivery agent refusing the return on
the false claim of a missing barcode.

Your continued delay and lack of communication are highly unprofessional
and unacceptable. I have been following up continuously, but your team has
not taken any responsibility to resolve this matter.

This email should be considered as a final reminder.

I request you to:

1. Resolve the issue immediately,


2. Approve the return and arrange pickup without any excuses, and


3. Process my refund on priority.



If I do not receive a response within the next 24 hours, I will be left
with no option but to escalate the matter to:

Senior management,

Consumer Grievance Cell, and

Appropriate legal and consumer protection authorities.


I expect an urgent response.

Regards,
Mujim khan

notes.body: Hello Dr Mujib Khan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is in regard to the concern raised about the wrong medicine received for your order #653684420710436864-52680. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     As per the update received from our team, please be informed that acording to packing footage we had dispatched medicines as per cart, however your are trying to return wrong medicine that too without barcode, also batch no. mentioned on wrong medicine belongs to inventory but currently stock is zero for the same.     Hence, we are unable to comply with your return request or refund for the same. Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the     App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Dr Mujib Khan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regard to the concern raised about the wrong medicine received for your order #653684420710436864-52680. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

As per the update received from our team, please be informed that acording to packing footage we had dispatched medicines as per cart, however your are trying to return wrong medicine that too without barcode, also batch no. mentioned on wrong medicine belongs to inventory but currently stock is zero for the same.

Hence, we are unable to comply with your return request or refund for the same. Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the

App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Hi Team,

  Order came in the HMS  queue, so the agent called to pitch HMS, but the
customer did not answer the call. Two attempts were made (a total of four
calls). As per our process, we keep the order on hold if the customer
misses the call. Due to month-end, we had a high order flow, so a third
attempt was not made and the order remained on hold. Agent have now called
the customer and the order has been processed


Regards,
Pranjal Parab
Subject Matter Expert
Pharmeasy

Agent have now called the customer and the order has been processed

notes.body: Hello Rashmi,     Greetings from PharmEasy!        With regards to your order #654049722578477056-86568, I can see a return request is already raised for the wrong product. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.   As per the records, the product are picked up on 2nd December 2025. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payment source within 5 - 7 business days.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Rashmi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654049722578477056-86568, I can see a return request is already raised for the wrong product. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

As per the records, the product are picked up on 2nd December 2025. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payment source within 5 - 7 business days.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,

Subject: #22240486 Issue with Order 652687964878118912 Received Only 30 Capsules Instead of 90

Description:
Hi Pharmeasy Team,

I hope youre doing well. I recently received my order from your website, but the package contained only 30 capsules, whereas the product I ordered is supposed to have 90 capsules.

Could you please arrange to either:

Ship the remaining capsules, or Process a refund for the missing quantity?

Please let me know how we can resolve this.Thank you for your assistance.

Kind regards,
Arumugapandian
